comments.author: Matt
comments.body: SuperFlag? That's just plain mean. How's about a plain-old-Flagstaff ride?

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Wow! A photo of George Bush on the Frenzy?! What next...Cheney and Bush willingly handing over [subpoenaed documents](http://www.guardian.co.uk/worldlatest/story/0,,-6743602,00.html) to the Frenz?

comments.author: Matt
comments.body: The rest of the Frenz missed another beautiful ride up Flagstaff today. The temperature took a marked and welcomed dip just above Flagstaff House all the way to the flag pole. A cool breeze and temperatures in the high 70s made it a great day to ride. Without anybody to chase, or be chased by, I took my sweet time and reached the summit a mere 38:05 after leaving Euclid & Broadway.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Holy cow! SB's checking in from the pup tent. I better behave or he'll cut his vacation short and come back here and throttle me.
